special_text:
[+2]: Look at the top three cards of your library, then put them back in any order. You may shuffle your library.
[-1]: Draw two cards, then put a card from your hand on the bottom of your library.
[-2]: Choose two other target permanents controlled by different players. Return those permanents to their owners' hands.
[-10]: Gain control of target player's library. They get an emblem with “Skip your draw step.”
